divs: sighting detailsi was smoking outside with three of my coworkers when i looked at the sky to my right and noticed two orangey\red orbs that resembled stars. when they started to moved and two others appeared i noticed they weren't that. they pulsated between red and orange and moved in a weird pattern around each other a bit. i brought it to the attention of my coworkers and one of them said there was a plane crash in shirley and that they must be helicopters. i told him they weren't because helicopters didn't fly that high neither did they have orange lights on them. he then said it was possibly a plane. then an actual airplane went by and my other coworker told him it can't be since that airplane that went by went quite a bit faster. i tried to get pictures but the light posts were reflecting off of my camera. they slowly started to disintegrate and after a good two mins and half the last one disintegrated. before it disintegrated it was moving in a barely noticeable wave pattern. i know that these are ufos as i've seen similar orbs in the last couple of months over the island and so have many other people. i find it weird i had just been telling my coworker about what had happened before about a month ago on the 4th of july and then this happened ten minutes later.
Summary: Smoking with coworkers and saw four ufos
